decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to quickly fill up the graveyard with powerful creatures such as Griselbrand and Archon of Cruelty using cards like Entomb and Thoughtseize, then bring them back onto the battlefield with spells like Reanimate and Animate Dead. By utilizing powerful reanimation combos, this deck aims to overwhelm opponents with massive threats early in the game, disrupting their game plan and quickly closing out the match. The inclusion of cards like Unmask and Collective Brutality helps to disrupt opponents' strategies and protect your own game plan.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using lands like Eldrazi Temple, Ancient Tomb, and Eye of Ugin to play powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and It That Heralds the End. It also disrupts the opponent with cards like Glaring Fleshraker and Chalice of the Void. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive plays and finish the game quickly, utilizing Eldrazi creatures with abilities that can quickly close out the game.

The main concept of this deck is to maintain aggressive pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan with counterspells and land destruction. The deck utilizes cheap threats like Delver of Secrets and Dragon's Rage Channeler to quickly deal damage, while also running a suite of card selection spells to find the right answers at the right time. By combining efficient threats with disruptive elements, this deck aims to control the pace of the game and win through consistent pressure.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly and aggressively control the board through efficient spells and creatures. Utilizing cards like Delver of Secrets, Dragon's Rage Channeler, and Murktide Regent, along with disruptive spells like Force of Will and Daze, the deck aims to apply pressure on the opponent while disrupting their game plan. The deck also includes a variety of fetch lands and cantrips to ensure consistency and tempo advantage. The overall strategy is to maintain a strong board presence while stopping the opponent's strategies with counterspells and removal spells.

The deck focuses on quickly assembling the Doomsday combo using cards like Infernal Tutor and Dark Ritual to generate mana. It aims to set up a winning situation by stacking the top of the library with specific cards using Doomsday and then drawing into those cards to win the game. The deck also includes disruption in the form of Duress and Thoughtseize to protect the combo and interact with the opponent. Thassa's Oracle serves as the win condition, allowing the player to win the game by stacking the library with a winning combo.

The main concept of this Mono Red Combo deck is to quickly generate mana and utilize cards like Burning Wish and Jeska's Will to search for win conditions such as Artist's Talent or Echo of Eons to combo off and win the game. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan by using cards like Defense Grid and Veil of Summer while also utilizing Mishra's Research Desk to draw key cards. The deck's strategy revolves around explosive plays and utilizing the mana acceleration provided by cards like Lotus Petal and Lion's Eye Diamond to win the game quickly.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and control the game through aggressive plays and disruptive spells. The deck utilizes cards like Lightning Bolt, Delver of Secrets, and Murktide Regent to apply pressure on the opponent while also having access to counterspells like Force of Will and Daze to protect its threats. The mana base is optimized for consistency and speed, with a mix of dual lands and fetch lands. Overall, this deck aims to outpace and outmaneuver the opponent to secure a victory.
